sentences.sContent: We have offices in over 56 countries worldwide.
sentences.sCn: 我们在全世界超过56个国家设有办事处。

sentences.sContent: cars with a worldwide reputation for reliability
sentences.sCn: 以性能可靠享誉世界的汽车

sentences.sContent: His books have sold more than 20 million copies worldwide.
sentences.sCn: 他的书在全世界卖出了两千多万本。

remMethod.val: world(世界)+wide(广泛的)→世界上广泛流传的→世界各地的

trans.tranOther: If something exists or happens worldwide, it exists or happens throughout the world
